name: Notre-Dame Cathedral
description: A Gothic masterpiece on the Île de la Cité.

name: Arc de Triomphe
description: Iconic triumphal arch at the western end of the Champs-Élysées.

name: Montmartre
description: A historic hilltop district famous for its artistic history and Sacré-Cœur.

name: Seine River Cruise
description: A relaxing boat ride offering views of Paris's landmarks along the Seine.

name: Louvre Museum
description: World-renowned art museum housing the Mona Lisa and thousands of works.

name: Eiffel Tower
description: The most iconic symbol of Paris, offering panoramic views of the city.
